definition: wine
wine (esp. rice wine)/liquor/spirits/alcoholic beverage/CL:杯[bei1],瓶[ping2],罐[guan4],桶[tong3],缸[gang1]

sentences.english: The coming musk-rose, full of dewy wine.
sentences.chinese: 麝香薔薇日日長，披滿露珠似酒漿。

sentences.english: The Wine of Life keeps oozing drop by drop.
sentences.chinese: 生命的酒漿滴滴地浸透不已。
